entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Assertion failed 'regArgTab[argNum].slot == 2' #83167
  • Ensure that the ref/*.cs files are consistent with what tooling produces #83166
  • Nested classes in System.Runtime.Intrinsics are missing xml doc comments #83165
  • Some hardware intrinsic ILLInk.Substitution entries may be unnecessary #83164
  • Blazor WebAssembly dotnet 8 Preview 1 with AOT Crashes on Safari on iOS #83161
  • [API Proposal]: Json多态类型处理器，未知类型处理建议 #83160
  • System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowBlock.ReceiveAsync does not use custom scheduler #83159
  • TraceSwitch can have inconsistent internal state #83153
  • JIT: Missing normalize-on-load for small-typed arg live across EH #83149
    8.0.0
  • The foreground color of the standard error output of console applications may not change. #83146
  • PerfView cannot attribute symbols to write barrier #83145
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: ImmutableArray.CreateUnsafe<T>(T[] array) #83141
    Future
  • [Fuzzlyn] x86 test failure involving field and division #83140
    8.0.0
  • ProcessTests.Test[Peak]WorkingSet[64] fail on Fedora 39 #83129
  • Should System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity.HasClaim perform case sensitive match for claim type? #83128
  • NativeRuntimeEventSource generates a large manifest that is never used #83127
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add FileAttributes.None #83125
  • Local clean build failure while linking `Corehost.static\singlefilehost.exe` #83123
  • [JIT] Possible AltJit assertion when alt-jitting ARM64 #83119

Closed

  • [wasm][debugger] Multiple tests failing on rolling builds on Windows #81792
    8.0.0
  • Add NT_SIGINFO NOTE for each thread to createdump dumps #40958
    6.0.x
  • Array.cs performs an Unsafe.As cast that is an undefined behaviour #83115
  • [API Proposal]: `Unsafe.BitCast` for efficient type reinterpretation #81334
  • [API Proposal]: Add ConsoleModifiers.None and ConsoleKey.None #79868
    8.0.0
  • [mono] Incorrect target method resolution in ldvirtftn+delegate creation #83003
  • System.Text.Json: The converter for derived type 'T' does not support metadata writes or reads. #83148
  • Bug in Configuration Binder 7.0.3 #82998
    7.0.x
  • Support WindowStyle without UseShellExecute in ProcessStartInfo and Process implementation on Windows #81681
    Future
  • Port 'Restrict named mutex files permissions' pull to current stable release #83133
  • Workaround broken Mono System.Drawing facades #82829
    8.0.0
  • Default constructor trimmed for generic argument #81720
  • Deserialization of classes with parametrized ctor is failing depending on number of arguments #83131
  • Clarification on NuGet versioning with regards to supported SDK/runtime #82225
    Future
  • JIT: Allow comparing GC pointers with `ccmp` #82703
  • Evaluate changing ValueTask to have two reference fields instead of one #55891
    Future
  • Native AOT debug info broken on MacOS #83038
    8.0.0
  • Arm64: Support containment of immediates for Vector<T> #31693
    Future
  • [NativeAOT/osx-arm64] Warnings publishing classlib with `StripSymbols=true` #80934
  • Improve gRPC support on mobile platforms #69095
    8.0.0
  • [Windows|Arm64] init-tools.cmd supports native dotnet cli #10946
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Call `FlushInstructionCache` in CFG test #83168
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [workloads] Add win-arm64 to wasm-tools in the net6 manifest #83162
    area-Build-mono
  • Rename ManagedVirtualMethodTable and adjust indices #83158
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • ignore expiration in NoCallback_RevokedCertificate_NoRevocationChecking_Succeeds test #83157
    area-System.Net.Http, test-enhancement
  • Testmerging jit64 #83151
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix handling of required & init-only properties with custom property names in source gen. #83147
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Fix EQ/NE(relop/SETCC, 0) optimization #83144
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Test merging baseservices/threading #83143
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • [release/7.0] Add more type-forwarders for Xamarin.Android compatibility to mscorlib.dll and System.Drawing.Common.dll #83137
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.x
  • Fixes #79187 Add MemoryMappedFile.CreateFromFile(SafeFileHandle) overload #83134
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add tar tests to confirm entries owned by deleted users can still be read or written #83126
    area-System.Formats.Tar
  • Swap order of OnError in FileSystemWatcher.ReadDirectoryChangesCallback on Windows #83121
    area-System.IO
  • Add new MemoryExtension.Replace(src, dst, ...) overload #83120
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Change execution order conditions for intellisense swapping and copying msbuild targets. #83117
    documentation, area-Infrastructure-libraries

Merged

  • Ensure that the new Vector512 related ISAs are covered by ILLink Substitutions #83040
    linkable-framework
  • Refactoring GenTreeVecCon to support TYP_SIMD64 #83053
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Use libc directly for math in the jiterpreter, implement more opcodes #82963
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • [wasm] Partially revert #82604 #83156
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • Fix undefined behaviour in Array.cs #83116
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Adding System.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe.BitCast #82917
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Lowering subset of Vector512 methods for avx512. #82953
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Revert to using latest chrome for testing #83150
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-VM-meta-mono
  • [wasm] Add tests for build with SIMD disabled #82845
    area-Build-mono
  • Add ConsoleKey.None and ConsoleModifiers.None #83114
    area-System.Console, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Implement parity for RAF and RDC attributes in NativeAOT #83085
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Add NT_SIGINFO NOTE to ELF dumps #83060
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.16
  • [release/7.0] Fix pthread_cond_wait race on macOS #82893
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 7.0.5
  • Support WindowStyle without UseShellExecute #82662
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • Add NT_SIGINFO NOTE to ELF dumps #83059
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.5
  • [release/7.0] [browser] fix asset counting after download retry #82617
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.5
  • Change a few more Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes to u8 in json #83138
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Clean up some code in SmtpDateTime #83142
    area-System.Net
  • [release/7.0] System.Console: allow terminfo files to be larger than 4KiB. #82082
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Console, 7.0.5
  • Update SourceBuild image to be our Centos 8 Stream image. #83106
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0] System.Console: allow terminfo files to be larger than 4KiB. #82433
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Console, 6.0.16
  • [mono] Fix virtual method resolution in mono_delegate_trampoline (). #83004
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [release/6.0] Install native dependencies on all Apple OS in CI #82322
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0][wasm] Use latest sdk 7.0 sdk for workload testing, and perf runs #82219
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, perf-pipeline
  • [release/7.0][workloads] Backport UsingMobileWorkload change #82268
    area-Build-mono
  • [release/7.0] Microsoft.NETCore.Platforms: fix graph not being updated on pack. #82851
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/7.0] Install native dependencies on all Apple OS in CI #82323
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Minor tweaks to IndexOfAnyLookupCore #83139
    area-System.Memory, 8.0.0
  • [wasi] Fixes to enable more tests #82966
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • Add wasm support to IndexOfAnyAsciiSearcher #83122
  • [mono][arm64] Implement delegate virtual invoke trampolines. #83028
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Switch JsonReaderHelper.IndexOfQuoteOrAnyControlOrBackSlash to use IndexOfAnyValues #82789
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Don't try to do devirt for Delegate.Invoke (). #83026
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Remove S.S.Permissions reference from S.C.ConfigurationManager #82259
    area-System.Configuration, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 8.0.0
  • Add type-forwarders for Xamarin.Android compatibility to System.Drawing.Common.dll #82839
    area-System.Drawing
  • Implement correct handling of new constraint in ilc #82818
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [browser] legacy JS interop optional via WasmEnableLegacyJsInterop - managed #82826
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Support converting OR(condition, condition) -> CCMP #83089
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • use MsQuic 2.1 again #83124
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [browser] cleanup before memory snapshot #83082
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [7.0] Fix superpmi_collect-setup.py helix images to use floating versions instead #83100
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.x
  • Update branding to 7.0.5 #83103
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update branding to 6.0.16 #83102
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Rename cgroup.cpp to cgroupcpu.cpp #83029
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • Arm64: Implement VectorTableLookup/VectorTableLookupExtension intrinsinsic + Consecutive registers support #80297
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • JIT: Remove TYP_BLK and TYP_LCLBLK #83036
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [tasks] Add auto runtime initialization template to LibraryBuilder #83050
    area-Build-mono
  • NoGCRegion Callback #82045
    area-GC-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [JIT] ARM64 - Overflow check optimizations for division #82924
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][jit] Use an mrgctx for all gshared methods. #82981
    NO-REVIEW
  • Remove fragile NGen logic for precomputed hashcodes #82563
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • [wasm] Initial emscripten 3.1.30 support #81215
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [release/7.0][wasm][debugger] Support new feature on browser: instrumentation pause #82854
    Servicing-consider, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.x
  • [release/6.0][wasm][debugger] Support new feature on browser: instrumentation pause #82855
    Servicing-consider, area-Debugger-mono, 6.0.x
  • CoreCLR support for InlineArrayAttribute. (struct layout part) #82744
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Allow multiple EventCounters sessions and make sure EventListners always send a Disable command #82970
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Expand runtime lookups in a late phase #81635
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add exceptions to TAR extended attribute constructors to disallow '=' and '\n' characters in keys and values. #82812
    area-System.Formats.Tar
  • Remove S.S.Permissions reference from S.DirectoryServices #82453
    area-System.DirectoryServices, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 8.0.0
  • Fix PAX extended attribute reading logic to treat '=' character as valid in the value strings. #82810
    area-System.Formats.Tar, 8.0.0
  • Vectorize ProbabilisticMap.IndexOfAny #80963
    area-System.Memory, 8.0.0
  • Allow Base64Decoder to ignore space chars, add IsValid methods and tests #79334
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [mono] Clean up the delegate info code #83030
    NO-REVIEW
  • JIT: Fold string fields in structs stored in static readonly fields #80431
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] wasm memory snapshot into browser cache #82049
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Backport #82480 (fix third argument to TypedArray.fill) #82572
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.x
  • [runtime/6.0] [mono] Raise soft RLIMIT_NOFILE on Linux #83079
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution, 6.0.x
  • [runtime/7.0] [mono] Raise soft RLIMIT_NOFILE on Linux #83078
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Update usage of AllowEmptyTelemetry based on changes to the task in the SDK #82805
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Do not use ALC name for AssemblyName in DispatchProxy #82807
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Reflection, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Port #82470 (disable EventPipe stack collection with environment variable) to 7.0 #82921
    Servicing-consider, EventPipe, area-Tracing-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Console.Unix: fix escape sequence for setting title on 'screen' TERM. #82432
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Console, 7.0.5
  • [release/7.0] Add a RID for Fedora 39 #82208
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, area-Host, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [release/7.0] Fix disposing root X.509 certificate prematurely for OCSP stapling #82277
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Security, 7.0.5
  • Avx512 extract most significant bits #82731
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Prevent use of null when processing ALPN list #81797
    area-System.Net.Security, blocked, os-linux, 7.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Add a RID for Fedora 39 #82210
    area-Host, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [6.0] Check for pending IO in the portable thread pool's worker threads #82248
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Threading, 6.0.16
  • [7.0] Check for pending IO in the portable thread pool's worker threads #82246
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Threading, 7.0.5
  • Add support for Inline TLS field access in JIT #82973
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Disable folding small-typed returned indirections #82846
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • .NET 6: enable building on platforms where strict-prototypes is on by default. #82525
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution, 6.0.x
  • [wasm] Add basic SIMD support to the jiterpreter #82773
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • Support sites with invalid IDN in SslStream #82934
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [7.0] Fix intellisense xml file selection from 'net' or 'dotnet-plat-ext' #82554
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.x
  • [6.0] Fix intellisense xml file selection from 'net' or 'dotnet-plat-ext' #82562
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 6.0.x
  • Default media type used when 'null' is passed to StringContent #81506 #81722
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Create AND chains in bool optimizer pass #79283
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Try to untangle the rid calculation. #82832
    community-contribution
  • [mono][jit] Adding more arm64 SIMD operations, SIMD codegen with instruction table. #83094
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Make area-owners.json true source for all area like labels dependencies #82534
    needs-author-action
  • Stress testing gtSplitTree #83005
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] Add intrinsics for BitOperations #82827
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [RISC-V] coreclr-jit directory #82379
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • update alpine test images #82931
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add option to decrypt Quic traffic in debug builds #83001
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [RISC-V] coreclr-vm and other directories in coreclr #82381
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • #78303 Add transformation ~v1 & v2 to VectorXxx.AndNot(v1, v2) #81993
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Switch to selfhosted NativeAOT compiler #81205
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Replace `SafeLocalAllocHandle` in `System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter` #82456
    area-System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter, community-contribution
  • Assist JIT in eliminating bounds checks #81036
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] coreclr-pal and coreclr-debug directories #82380
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add '--self-contained' and '--no-self-contained' options to `dotnet test` command #31066
  • Add support for RazorLangVersion 8 #31058

Closed

  • Wrong version number under "Installed Apps" #30993
  • dotnet list return code changed #30975
  • .NET 7 SDK's dotnet.exe change the attached terminal code page when its standard output is redirected #30170
  • TFM trimming, and elimination of net4* targeting in Linux source-build #27642
  • Consistency for `os` and `arch` CLI argument names #30962
  • Whats the triage process here? #29960
  • Latest mcr.microsoft.com/dotnet/sdk:7.0-alpine reporting vulnerable dependencies on trivy scan #31074
  • Improve error messages reported when a workload is missing #30230
  • Enable workloads on arm64 #27243
    8.0.1xx

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix documentation link #31078
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [Breaking Backport] Restore Console Encoding upon Exit #31077
    Area-CLI
  • Disable analyzers for dotnet-watch when running source-build. #31076
    Area-AspNetCore
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #31060
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add test trying to reproduce the race in generating wrong file through enumerating files #31059
  • Refactor command line options parsing, add/improve imp of --launch-profile and --no-launch-profile options. #31054
    Area-Watch

Merged

  • Restore Encoding for the .NET SDK upon Exit #30963
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #31052
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #31053
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add tracking of the nuget cache and update to a flag zip list #29264
    Area-Infrastructure
  • edit: `applyPathes` -> `applyPatches` #30852
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2130881 #30714
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Trim away netframework targets in source-build #31069
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add some more details on team triage #30574
    Area-NetSDK
  • [release/7.0.1xx] Create workloads enumerator lazily in dotnet-new hos #30773
    Servicing-approved
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #30900
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the Newtonsoft.Json to 13.0.1 #31023
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 7.0.203 #31038
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Do a two-phase publish to mimic VS behavior #29817
    Area-NetSDK
  • 30784 dotnet info workload info #31007
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Produce reference assembly when target is .NET Standard #30792
  • Blazor hosted #30908
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add a PostAction to support modifying Json files in CLI templates #29880
    Area-dotnet new
  • fix displaying column when param is specified #31003
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Introduce `Workload Clean`: Garbage Collection Component #30266
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-08
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Proposal: Semi-Auto-Properties; `field` keyword #140
    Working Set
  • [Proposal] Forcing ConfigureAwait(false) on assembly level #2542
  • [Proposal]: Collection literals #5354
    Working Set
  • Primary Constructors #2691
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: Extensions #5497
    Working Set

PullRequests

Created

  • Update collection literal natural type #7039
  • Add more details to extensions spec #7038

Merged

  • Update primary-constructors.md #7036

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `Simplifier.AddImportsAnnotation` does not work with Attributes #67237

Closed

  • 50x slower build with .net 6.0.403 compared to 6.0.402 #66475
    17.6
  • SyntaxContext can't infer FunctionPointer type #50764
    Backlog
  • CA1044 (Properties should not be write only) False Positive #67235
  • Microsoft.VisualStudio.ImageCatalog is blocking moving to net5.0 #50893
    Backlog
  • IDE0044 (Add readonly modifier) false positive #47197
  • IDE0057 drops `checked` and `unchecked` modifiers for range simplification #60988
    17.5

PullRequests

Created

  • [DO NOT MERGE] #67239
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Make the import of IPasteTrackingService optional #67238
    Area-IDE
  • [Lightbulb Perf] Run analyzers only for requested span #67236
    Area-Analyzers
  • Fix PatternMatcher caching in CompletionHelper #67232
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Fix error location in test #67234
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Infra fixes #67223
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Use next sibling in SyntaxNode.GetChildPosition() if available #66876
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Support generating methods when used in function pointer contexts #67230
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Update 'make field readonly' to understand a special strict behaviour around generic assignment. #67227
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Update tests to use raw strings. #67231
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix issue with 'use range operator' #67200
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove 'ID' argument from WorkItem. (IDE only) #67210
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Bind extension declarations #67126
    Area-Compilers
  • Generate branchless IL for `(b ? 1 : 0)` #67191
    Area-Compilers
  • Enforce proper shadowing for locals and parameters in EE #67189
    Area-Compilers
  • Warn when taking address of local or parameter in async method #66915
    Area-Compilers
  • EnC telemetry improvements #67178
    Interactive-EnC
  • Keep runtime version in sync with VS #67164
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add 'name' to option group #67136
    Area-IDE
  • Revert "Split out ref safety analysis into a separate pass after binding (#64928)" #67082
    Area-Compilers
  • Visit replacement expression before adding placeholder in RefSafetyAnalysis visitor #67155
    Area-Compilers
  • Initial binding and lowering of collection literals with single-valued elements #67025
  • Move all Document Outline update operations to background thread #65641
    Area-IDE
  • Primary Constructors - Don't report unused parameters #67167
    Area-IDE
  • Implement 'Make field/property required' codefix #67175
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Allow 'convert to interpolated string' to work in any API, instead of just a whitelisted set. #67135
    Area-IDE
  • Have AsyncLazy always cache values #67207
    Area-IDE
  • Fix failure to expose IsExternalInit in net6.0 binaries #67171
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Blazor] Using event callbacks in backing classes #47098
  • API proposal: Razor Component IResult #47096
    8.0-preview3
  • Query binding with default values inconsistent #47095
  • Add helper methods for constructing a RazorComponentResult #47094
    .NET 8 Planning
  • APP_POOL_ID environmental variable is null before app.Run() runs for some time. #47093
  • JObject as api result, but return a null array #47091
  • @onclick not invoked on <a> tags when in disabled fieldset #47090
  • InputSelect with empty option doesn't validate int #47088

Closed

  • Testing issue labeler work by immitating a real Blazor issue #47103
  • [SignalR] Server doesn't stop streaming after cancellation on client #46861
    8.0-preview3
  • built-in Rate Limiting middleware in .Net 7 #46974
  • TFM trimming, and elimination of net4* targeting in Linux source-build #43696
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Blazor Sections API Proposal #46937
    8.0-preview3
  • Sections support in Blazor #28182
    8.0-preview3
  • Components E2E consistently timing out in 7.0 and 6.0 #47080
  • HotReload causing runtime issue #37504
    Backlog
  • Multiple Kestrel Libuv tests failing in 6.0 on win-arm64 #47078
  • Basic discovery of endpoints #46978
    8.0-preview3
  • Port dotnet-run's DOTNET_ROOT changes to dotnet-watch #35793
    .NET 8 Planning
  • 'dotnet watch run' for a console app keeps restarting after one modification #38064
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Blazor Routes API Request to Page #46850
  • Support inferring parameters bound from JSON body or service #46786
    8.0-preview3
  • Problem with `dotnet watch` and `launchSettings.json` #46596

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix Linux-Musl Composite Artifacts not being built #47104

Merged

  • Remove some Linq usages from Kestrel.Core #47012

  • [release/7.0] Use new Chromium headless mode to fix E2E test timeouts (#46812) #47082

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Dotnet-Counters reports higher Gen 2 Size, than GC Heap Size #3730
  • Make async overloads of DiagnosticsClient public #3727
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Merged

  • [Dotnet Monitor] Adding `SystemDiagnosticsMetrics` Trigger #3697

Updated

  • Add analyzers, fix issues detected by them, style enforcement, and some misc bugs in SOSRunner #3721
  • Add AssemblyLoadContext for loading extensions #3649
    8.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Windows] MAUI app crashes when XAML Hot Reloading ShellContent within Shell.xaml #13775
  • WebView Source Binding does not update when navigating #13774
  • MAUI WinUI Drag/Drop Not Working On Same UIElement #13770
    Backlog
  • should try to restore the style of each platform. #13768
    Backlog
  • SwipeViewItems aren't added to the `LogicalChildren` of the `SwipeView` control once they are revealed. #13765
    Backlog
  • MAUI application error due to entry element in background operation #13762
    Backlog
  • Support x:Name for code generation in DataTemplate #13760
  • IPreference not initialized #13759
  • Get the MAUI window object from the platform window object #13758
  • Certain kinds of PathGeometry result in an unhandled runtime exception #13757
  • ListView sets Cell's BindingContext to self, causing multiple warnings and/or InvalidCastExceptions #13754

Closed

  • The alpha check for using OverFullScreen on a transparent modal is currently incorrect #12031
    Backlog
  • CommunityToolkit.Mvvm.SourceGenerators has errors #13773
  • [Enhancement] Automatically importing specific resources #13766
  • App crash in Tab ShellContent page if any Entry control is there and changing tab and comeback to same tab #12644
    Backlog
  • Weird behavior with Compiled Bindings #13764
  • RadioButton colors doesn't work #13771
  • Another problem Occurs in Release Mode, Dynamic Color or Programmatically C# not Changed... [RELEASE MODE ONLY] #10181
  • Binding BackgroundColor on Button not propagate when changed in Release .NET MAUI MVVM (Android device) #13772
  • [Android/iOS] Scrollview Direction=Both not working with Label as the content #7979
  • ScrollView‘s HorizontalScrollBar is not visible and ScrollView cannot scroll horizontally #9000
  • Vertical scrolling in <ScrollView Orientation="Both"> not working #7811
  • Cannot scroll vertically when Orientation is Both #5759
    Backlog
  • [Bug] Scrollview is not scrolling vertically #2768
    Backlog
  • CollectionView Windows Memory Leak, Android Laggy scrolling #13557
    Backlog
  • VisualElement Background/Shadow `Notify` code creates a strong relationship between the brush and the element #12344
    Backlog
  • iOS Rotate animation is very choppy due to LOTS of unneceesary measure cycles and makes application unusably slow #11891
    Backlog
  • Make DynamicResource bindings be supported as normal bindings #13724
  • Unable to upload IPA file to Apple Appstore #13763
  • SwipeView causes Shadows to be clipped #9062
  • [Windows] `WindowOverlay.DisableUITouchEventPassthrough` does not work #13049
    Backlog
  • Android app crash with NavigationPage in Release build #11978
  • How do I Pin a Maui App to a specific version? #8985

    t/bug, area/layout 🔲, platform/android 🤖, layout-scrollview
  • [controls] fix memory leak in `VisualElement.Background` #13656
    area/controls 🎮
  • Skip GradientBackgroundInitializesCorrectly on iOS #13767
  • Preventing NullReferenceException on WebAuthenticatorIntermediateActi… #12347
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨, backport/suggested
  • [Android] Fix shadow clipping issue using SwipeView #13616
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #13755
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fixed RadioButtonGallery TemplateFromStyle page. #13756
    area/controls 🎮, control-radiobutton

Updated

  • Run templates on Android and iOS #13662
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, area/testing
  • Bugfix for text not properly aligned with radioButton when in RTL for Android #13610
    area/controls 🎮, control-radiobutton
  • Blank image when Source set to null or on image loading error #13614
    area/controls 🎮, control-image
  • Allow SearchBar to take full width on Android #13716
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • Only cache the dynamic AppTheme and LayoutDirection values in Controls #11200
    t/bug, area/Xaml </>, platform/android 🤖, area/theme
  • [MacOS/iOS] Fixed incorrect color of RadioButton in Dark Mode using Default Control Template. #13215
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-radiobutton
  • Shell routing and Service registration automation #13402

  • [iOS] Implement ScrollView Orientation #13657

  • Make Android sizing of ShapeViews consistent with iOS and Windows #6206

  • [Windows] Changes in SwipeViewHandler #11229

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SQLite cannot get schema for tables that have names with double quotes #30441
  • using entity framework as key storage for .net data protection #30440
  • Changing state of an entity (retrieved with AsNoTracking) will throw an ArgumentNullException #30439
  • Retrive shadow properties with Notrack #30438
  • I can't perform a Migration #30437
  • Limits mapping to JSON columns - EF Core 7, SQL Server #30434

Closed

  • Access join-entity's navigation property with include(x => x.Y) #30401
  • ReadOnly DbContext for multithreading (only read operations) #30436
  • Explicit reference load does not work on removed entity after upgrade to EF 7 #30406
  • EF fetching entity from tracked region #30382
  • Entity property 'DefaultValue' does not work. #30377
  • How to change PK and FK names in TPT tables? (fluent API, EF Core 7) #30376
  • "Login failed for user '<token-identified principal>" when creating database in migration (at runtime) #30363
  • How to find computed column in Changetracker #30354
  • How can i customize the dbcontext by adding arguments to its constructors, using adddbcontextpool registration #30350
  • Scaffolding: not adding HasTrigger #30253
  • Scaffolded collection navigation properties do not have setters #30286
    7.0.5
  • Added nullable property to Json mapped model resulting in errors instead of mapping non existing json property to null #30028
    7.0.5
  • The scaffolding not work properly #30435
  • Cryptic exception when accidentally reusing the same parameter instance in dynamically-constructed query #30383
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #30432
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Better exception when same parameter instance is reused in multiple lambdas #30427
    auto-merge

Updated

  • Fix to #30410 - JSON: optimize update path for single property element - don't wrap the value in json array #30422
